titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of "World Alzheimer's Month".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
9/27/2013--Introduced. Expresses support for the goals and ideals of World Alzheimer's Month.
Acknowledges: (1) the impact Alzheimer's has on the lives of individuals, and (2) the progress and improvements neurological research has made in the diagnosis and treatment of Alzheimer's and other forms of dementia.
